data.content: The "Bureaucratic Ooze" concept marries the chaotic, amorphous nature of an ooze with the rigid, often frustrating structure of corporate bureaucracy. The humor comes from this stark contrast – an inherently form
data.query:
Magic: The Gathering card design for: Bureaucratic Ooze
Concept: An ooze that has somehow become a mid-level manager in a fantasy corporation
